title: Cross-Chain Protocol Reentrancy Exploit
summary: A popular cross-chain protocol was exploited for $15.5M due to a reentrancy vulnerability in its bridge contract. Security audits for bridge protocols remain a top priority.

title: Arbitrum Stylus Mainnet Upgrade
summary: Arbitrum Stylus is now officially live on mainnet, allowing developers to write smart contracts in Rust, C, and C++ with Ethereum's security.

title: Solana Firedancer v1.0 Release
summary: The first version of Firedancer, the independent Solana validator client, has reached v1.0, improving network resilience and throughput.

title: Immunefi Boosts Critical Payouts for L2s
summary: Immunefi has announced new bounty incentives for identifying critical vulnerabilities in major L2 sequencers and fraud proof systems.

title: New DeFi Security Standard Proposed
summary: A consortium of top auditing firms has proposed a new smart contract security standard (EIP-XXXX) to formalize reentrancy guards.
